name: Relic of Agony
description:
Enemies you interrupt are inflicted with Agony of the Choir.
This trait can only affect enemies with defiance bars once per interval.

name: Relic of Akeem
description: When you disable an enemy that is afflicted by 5 or more stacks of confusion or torment, inflict confusion and torment on enemies around the target.

name: Relic of Altruism
description: Grant might and fury to nearby allies after using a healing skill.

name: Relic of Antitoxin
description: Outgoing condition cleanses remove an additional condition. <c=@reminder>This can only affect an ally once every 10 seconds.</c>

name: Relic of Atrocity
description: Your lifesteal damage and healing is increased.

name: Relic of Bava Nisos
description: Upon using a <c=@abilitytype>stance</c> skill, cleanse conditions from yourself.

name: Relic of Bloodstone
description: Gain Bloodstone Volatility when you successfully combo a field with a blast finisher. Blasting at the stack threshold triggers an explosion, granting increased damage.

name: Relic of Castora
description: Healing to other allies is increased while they are below the health threshold.

name: Relic of Cerus
description: Upon using an elite skill, summon an Eye of Cerus that emits a rotating line attack, dealing damage and converting boons into conditions.

name: Relic of Dagda
description: After using an elite skill, fire a projectile at the target or nearest enemy that damages and inflicts conditions. Damage scales with the recharge of the elite skill.

name: Relic of Durability
description: Gain protection and regeneration after using a healing skill.

name: Relic of Dwayna
description: Regeneration you apply is more effective.

name: Relic of Evasion
description: Gain vigor after evading an attack.

name: Relic of Febe
description: When you use a healing skill, grant nearby allies swiftness and remove movement-impairing conditions from them.

name: Relic of Fire
description: Gain fire aura after using a healing skill. Fire aura now increases your outgoing strike damage.

name: Relic of Fireworks
description: Upon dealing strike damage using a weapon skill with a recharge time of 20 seconds or more, deal increased strike damage for a duration. Refreshes duration on stack.

name: Relic of Geysers
description: Restore endurance to allies when you grant them vigor.

name: Relic of Isgarren
description: After evading an enemy's attack, place the Eye of Isgarren on them for a duration. You deal increased strike and condition duration against enemies with the Eye of Isgarren.

name: Relic of Karakosa
description: Heal other nearby allies when you successfully combo a field with a blast finisher.

name: Relic of Leadership
description: Convert conditions into boons on nearby allies after using an elite skill.

name: Relic of Lyhr
description: Upon healing an ally, shield up to four allies, redirecting a percentage of any strike damage they take to yourself. Allies may only be protected by one shield at a time.

name: Relic of Mabon
description: Upon applying might while in combat, gain Mabon's Strength. At 10 stacks, your might stacks become more effective for a duration, after which you lose all might and Mabon's Strength.

name: Relic of Mercy
description: Revive allies faster and with more health.

name: Relic of Mistburn
description: When you grant might to yourself, grant yourself additional might. Gain increased critical-strike chance while at or above the might threshold.

name: Relic of Mosyn
description: Remove a nondamaging condition whenever you evade an attack.

name: Relic of Mount Balrior
description: After using an elite skill, create an area underneath yourself. Standing in this area increases your outgoing strike damage.

name: Relic of Nayos
description: Removing a condition from yourself heals you.

name: Relic of Nourys
description: Gain stacks of Nourys's Hunger every interval when you remove boons from enemies. Consume 10 stacks to grow larger, dealing increased damage, taking reduced damage, and converting a percentage of outgoing damage into healing.

name: Relic of Peitha
description: After shadowstepping or using a deception skill, fire a blade at a nearby enemy after a short delay, applying torment and increasing your strike damage against that target.

name: Relic of Resistance
description: Gain resistance after using a healing skill.

name: Relic of Reunification
description: Gain frost aura and light aura after using a healing skill.

name: Relic of Rivers
description: Gain alacrity and regeneration at the end of your dodge roll.

name: Relic of Sorrow
description: After using an elite skill, create an area that protects allies and destroys enemy projectiles.

name: Relic of Speed
description: Increase movement speed when under the effect of swiftness.

name: Relic of Surging
description: Gain shocking aura for 4 seconds after using an elite skill.

name: Relic of the Adventurer
description: Gain 50% endurance after using a healing skill. <c=@reminder>(Cooldown: 20 Seconds)</c>

name: Relic of the Afflicted
description: Create a Death Nova at a foe's location upon their defeat that inflicts poison and bleeding. <c=@reminder>(Cooldown: 10 Seconds)</c>

name: Relic of the Aristocracy
description: Gain 3% condition duration for 8 seconds when inflicting weakness or vulnerability on a foe, up to a maximum of 5 stacks. <c=@reminder>(Cooldown: 1 Second)</c>

name: Relic of the Astral Ward
description: Gain a Signet of the Astral Ward after using a signet skill. Using a signet skill while this signet is active consumes it to remove conditions from nearby allies and grant them resistance.

name: Relic of the Beehive
description: After using an elite skill, release a wave of pheromones that causes bees to swarm enemies struck.

name: Relic of the Biomancer
description: Heal yourself when you inflict bleeding or poison on a foe.

name: Relic of the Blightbringer
description: Gain stacks of Greer's Virulence when you inflict poison on a foe. After reaching the maximum number of stacks, the next time you inflict poison also inflicts additional conditions on nearby enemies.

name: Relic of the Brawler
description: Deal increased strike damage for a duration when granting protection or resolution to yourself.

name: Relic of the Cavalier
description: Grant yourself aegis, quickness, swiftness, resistance, and might when striking an enemy with your mount's <c=@abilitytype>engage</c> skill.

name: Relic of the Centaur
description: Gain stability when you use a healing skill.

name: Relic of the Chronomancer
description: Gain quickness when you use a <c=@abilitytype>well</c> skill.

name: Relic of the Citadel
description: After using an elite skill, call down an artillery strike that inflicts stun on the skill target or nearest enemy.

name: Relic of the Claw
description: Deal increased strike damage for a duration after you disable a foe.

name: Relic of the Daredevil
description: After dodge rolling in combat or evading an attack, your next attack is guaranteed to be a critical hit. <c=@reminder>(Cooldown: 1 Second)</c>

name: Relic of the Deadeye
description: Deal increased strike damage for a duration when you use a <c=@abilitytype>cantrip</c> skill.

name: Relic of the Defender
description: Heal a percentage of your maximum health after blocking an attack. If you block again within 5 seconds, you heal less each time down to a minimum of 1%.

name: Relic of the Demon Queen
description:
Poison that you apply reduces healing by an additional amount. Disabling a foe applies poison.
Disables include stun, taunt, daze, knockback, pull, knockdown, sink, float, fear, and launch.

name: Relic of the Dragonhunter
description: Enemies hit by your trap skills become hunted by you, increasing your strike damage and condition duration against them.

name: Relic of the Eagle
description: Deal increased strike damage to low-health enemies.

name: Relic of the Earth
description: Grant protection and magnetic aura to allies after using an elite skill.

name: Relic of the Firebrand
description: Upon using the final charge of a mantra skill, gain increased boon duration.

name: Relic of the First Revenant
description: Gain incoming condition damage reduction while you have resistance.

name: Relic of the Flock
description: Grant barrier to yourself and nearby allies after you use a healing skill.

name: Relic of the Founding
description: Gain barrier when you successfully combo a field with a leap finisher.

name: Relic of the Fractal
description: When you inflict bleeding on an enemy with 6 or more stacks of bleeding, also inflict burning and torment.

name: Relic of the Golemancer
description: Summon a golem while in combat.

name: Relic of the Herald
description: Gain concentration after granting a boon to an ally.

name: Relic of the Holosmith
description: Create a laser disk after you use an elite skill.

name: Relic of the Ice
description: After using an elite skill, launch icicles that inflict chilled at nearby enemies.

name: Relic of the Krait
description: After using an elite skill, emit a wave of corruption that inflicts damaging conditions.

name: Relic of the Lich
description: Summon a jagged horror while in combat.

name: Relic of the Living City
description:
Complete each trigger once to gain stacks of Titanic Potential:
 Use a healing skill
 Use an elite skill
 Finish a combo field
 Disable an enemy
 Evade an attack
At 5 stacks, gain Soul of the Titan, providing increased attributes and all boons for its duration.

name: Relic of the Midnight King
description:
Grant might and fury to nearby allies when you disable an enemy.
Disables include stun, taunt, daze, knockback, pull, knockdown, sink, float, fear, and launch.

name: Relic of the Mirage
description: Inflict torment upon successfully evading an attack.

name: Relic of the Mist Stranger
description: Siphon health whenever you hit a foe.

name: Relic of the Mists Tide
description: Cleanse a condition from yourself when you successfully combo a field with a leap or blast finisher.

name: Relic of the Monk
description: Increase healing effectiveness to allies after granting a boon to an ally.

name: Relic of the Necromancer
description: Fear you inflict causes foes to move slower.

name: Relic of the Nightmare
description: After using an elite skill, send forth a nightmare pulse that inflicts fear and poison on nearby enemies.

name: Relic of the Ogre
description: Summon a rock dog while in combat.

name: Relic of the Pack
description: Grant superspeed to nearby allies after using an elite skill.

name: Relic of the Phenom
description: Upon using a <c=@abilitytype>cantrip</c> or <c=@abilitytype>meditation</c> skill, gain protection.

name: Relic of the Pirate Queen
description: Gain quickness when you disable a foe.

name: Relic of the Privateer
description: Summon a parrot while in combat.

name: Relic of the Reaper
description: Chill nearby enemies after executing a <c=@abilitytype>shout</c> skill.

name: Relic of the Scoundrel
description: Gain increased critical-hit chance for a duration after inflicting blindness or weakness.

name: Relic of the Scourge
description: Upon applying barrier to an ally, gain increased condition duration. <c=@reminder>When this triggers, refresh the duration of all stacks.</c>

name: Relic of the Sorcerer
description: When you inflict crippled, chilled, or immobile, you also inflict vulnerability.

name: Relic of the Steamshrieker
description: Burn nearby enemies when you successfully combo a water field with a blast or leap finisher.

name: Relic of the Stormsinger
description: After using a movement skill, your next attack creates an arc of chain lightning that strikes nearby enemies.

name: Relic of the Sunless
description: Using an elite skill summons a pool on the target enemy that inflicts poison and cripple. Pool duration scales with the recharge of the elite skill.

name: Relic of the Thief
description: Upon striking an enemy with a weapon skill that has a recharge or resource cost, gain increased strike damage. <c=@reminder>When this triggers, refresh the duration of all stacks.</c>

name: Relic of the Trooper
description: Remove a condition from affected allies after using a <c=@abilitytype>shout</c> skill.

name: Relic of the Twin Generals
description: Gain might and weaken nearby enemies when you use a healing skill. Gain additional might for each enemy struck.

name: Relic of the Unseen Invasion
description: Grant yourself and nearby allies superspeed when you enter or exit stealth.

name: Relic of the Warrior
description: Weapon swap recharge time is reduced.

name: Relic of the Water
description: Cleanse conditions from yourself and nearby allies after using a healing skill.

name: Relic of the Wayfinder
description: Gain increased movement speed, which is further increased while out of combat. When you enter combat, gain a burst of speed.

name: Relic of the Weaver
description: Upon using a <c=@abilitytype>stance</c> skill, deal increased strike damage for a duration.

name: Relic of the Wizard's Tower
description: After using an elite skill, shield yourself with a projectile-reflecting barrier while summoning a wave that pulls enemies toward you.

name: Relic of the Zephyrite
description: Summon crystals that apply protection and resolution to allies after using an elite skill. Crystal duration scales with the recharge of the used skill.

name: Relic of Thorns
description: Gain stacking condition damage when you are hit by a poisoned foe. <c=@reminder>When this triggers, it refreshes the duration of all stacks.</c>

name: Relic of Vampirism
description: Siphon life from nearby foes when you use a healing skill. Restore a portion of your maximum health upon killing a foe.

name: Relic of Vass
description: After using a healing or elixir skill, your next few attacks inflict poison. <c=@reminder>Healing skills can only trigger this effect once every interval.</c>

name: Relic of Zakiros
description: While you are under the effects of fury, convert a percentage of your outgoing critical-strike damage into healing.
